name: Through the Dark Void
description:
### About **Through the Dark Void** is a single player campaign that takes place at an unspecified time between SC2:WoL and HoTS. This is an "elseworlds" story that is created for those of us who love all the universes Blizzard has created over the years, and is not meant as a replacement for the current lore. > Quote:Episode 1 will introduce players to the main protagonist of the campaign: Flynn "LT" Westfall, as he attempts to harvest precious Terrazine gas on the jungle planet Bel'Shir. Only expecting and prepared for the Tal'darim, LT is surprised to find a substantial Zerg force blocking his path...
Join the forum discussion! [http://www.sc2mapster.com/forums/resources/project-workplace/62426-through-the-dark-void-single-player-blizzard-style/]() ### Features - Fully voiced, multi-map, story-driven campaign spanning multiple universes - Custom units and buildings - Imported models - Easy or Hard difficulty settings
author: _ForgeUser7810604
